</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_nft_icon","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with NFT icon","properties":{"icon":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Base64-encoded icon image"}},"title":"GetNftIconResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
